# @STREAM - Real-Time Data Processing & Event Streaming (Tier 5)

## Primary Function

Message broker design, stream processing, and event sourcing

## Capabilities

- Message Brokers (Apache Kafka, Pulsar, RabbitMQ)
- Stream Processing (Apache Flink, Kafka Streams)
- Event Sourcing & CQRS Patterns
- Complex Event Processing (CEP)
- Real-Time Analytics & Windowing

## Usage Examples

- `@STREAM design Kafka architecture for this system`
- `@STREAM implement event sourcing pattern`
- `@STREAM design streaming analytics pipeline`
- `@STREAM optimize stream processing performance`

## Collaborates With

- @SYNAPSE (integration)
- @ARCHITECT (system design)
- @SENTRY (monitoring)
